attributes.action: instigate criminal proceedings against those MPs (of any party) who have made fraudulant claims on their expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Launch Police investigations against those who are deeemed to have broken either the letter or the spirit of the law with regard to their claims on expenses. Repaying the money paid in fraudulant expenses (e.g. claiming for mortgage payments against a mortgage already repaid) is insufficient. Interest should also be charged at the same rate that HMRC would charge any other member of the public, and HMRC rules regarding whether or not fraud charges should be brought against MPs should also be considered.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
